revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Lake Valor |image = [[File:Lake Valor.png|300px]] |caption = A bird's-eye view of Lake Valor. |tokens = 74,500 |location = North of Route 213. }} '''Lake Valor''' is a dungeon in [[Sinnoh]]. It has 64 tiles arranged in an 8x8 square, including 8 chest tiles, 19 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile.
==Dungeon Stats==
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Pokémon !! Base Health |- | Random Encounter || 811,500 |- | Noctowl (Boss) || 3,960,000 |- | Azelf (Boss) || 8,060,000 |}
==Pokémon==
* Staravia * Bibarel * Psyduck * Golduck * Magikarp * Goldeen * Noctowl (boss) * Azelf (boss)
==Items==
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Chance to Find |- | {{Bag3|X Attack}} [[X Attack|xAttack]] || 33% |- | {{Bag3|X Click}} [[XClick|xClick]] || 33% |- | {{Bag3|Item Magnet}} [[Item Magnet]] || 33% |}
